title: #316:  Correcting Quillette's Analysis of "Allen v. Farrow" (AvF - Part 10)
description:
We continue pointing out the many contradictions in the Quillette podcast episode covering the HBO Docu-series "Allen v Farrow". Their take could not be more different than our analysis, and we want to set the record straight. It is important to note that Woody Allen has always denied any wrongdoing and has never been charged nor convicted of any crime. 


The original podcast we are referring to if you want to hear it and judge for yourself can be found at: https://quillette.com/2021/04/04/podcast-143-daphne-merkin-on-the-baseless-abuse-claims-against-woody-allen-and-why-the-media-refuses-to-let-them-die/


#webelieveDylan

#victimsmatter

#dylanfarrow

#miafarrow

#woodyallen

#janedoefilms

#allenvfarrow


The full Kathy Griffin clip can be seen here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j74_TSnuN9o

 

We are so grateful to our sponsors, please check out their special offers for our Real Crime Profile listeners.
